response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price of $1,150,000. By choosing this offer, you not only secure a significant savings but also gain access to a treasure that promises unparalleled benefits and experiences. I believe this is a fair and generous offer, and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
